xmldoc.short_description: Install, uninstall and manage the local Nelson help system and module help files.

param_input_item.param_description: Install the local help system (all modules, all languages). Optional second argument verbose (logical) controls verbosity; default is true.
Name of the module to add or remove from the local help tree.
Directory containing the module's help archive(s).
logical scalar (true/false). When provided to 'install' it controls whether install steps show verbose output.

description.p: The function manages a local, versioned help directory under userdir()/Nelson/<version>/help/.
install: creates and installs the local help system (calls docroot('.') and install locally). Use the optional verbose boolean to toggle output.
add: extracts per-language .nhz help archives found in module_help_dir/help/ into the versioned help/lang/<module_name> directories.
remove: removes the module help directory for each language.
refresh, uninstall, status: respectively refresh the help database, uninstall the local help system, or return whether the local help folder exists. Actions that can fail return [status, message].
